dwelling.name: Warren
dwelling.description: Gives troglodytes to a visiting hero for free once per week

dwelling.name: Harpy loft
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit harpies. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Pillar of Eyes
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit beholders. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Chapel of Stilled Voices
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit medusae. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Labyrinth
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit minotaurs. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several minotaurs

dwelling.name: Manticore Lair
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit manticores. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several manticores

dwelling.name: Dragon Cave
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit red dragons. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a red dragons
